description.value:
A socialite staff is designed as an ornate cane, its metal body glimmering with jewels and gold inlays. A sculpture carved from obsidian tops the head of the staff, its design depending on its wielder's taste. Common choices include birds, flowers, or family crests. While wielding a socialite staff, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Make an Impression]{Make an Impression} on members of high society.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Read the Air]{Read the Air}
  • 1st@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Charm]{Charm}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Restyle]{Restyle}
  • 2nd@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Befitting Attire]{Befitting Attire}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Phantom Crowd]{Phantom Crowd}
  • 3rd@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Bottomless Stomach]{Bottomless Stomach}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Shift Blame]{Shift Blame}
  • 4th@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Befitting Attire]{Befitting Attire}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Suggestion]{Suggestion}
  • 5th@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Befitting Attire]{Befitting Attire}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Charm]{Charm}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Glimmer of Charm]{Glimmer of Charm}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Suggestion]{Suggestion}

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
